verbs.description: IN his willingness to [V: dump] [ARG1: the Iran nuclear accord crafted by the Obama administration] , [ARG0: President Trump] reinforced his status as an outsider unwilling to automatically defer to Washington “ experts . ” But in his conclusions about the Iranian agreement , Trump was well within the mainstream of the Republican Party . This can be seen from the reaction of Oklahoma 's congressional delegation , whose members are reliable conservatives but mostly known for working within the system . Sen. Jim Inhofe , R - Tulsa , said the Iranian deal “ only paused Iran 's nuclear development and did nothing to address their malign behavior in the region or their ballistic missile capabilities . ” Sen.
